verses.verse: A Prayer of David. Bow down <WH5186> thine ear <WH241>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, and answer <WH6030> me <WH6041>; For I am poor and needy <WH34>.
Preserve <WH8104> my soul <WH5315>; For I am godly <WH2623>: O thou my God <WH430>, save <WH3467> thy servant <WH5650> that trusteth in thee <WH982>.
Be merciful <WH2603> unto me <WH136>, O Lord; For unto thee do I cry <WH7121> all the day long <WH3117>.
Rejoice <WH8055> the soul <WH5315> of thy servant <WH5650>; For unto thee <WH136>, O Lord, do I lift up <WH5375> my soul <WH5315>.
For thou <WH136>, Lord, art good <WH2896>, and ready to forgive <WH5546>, And abundant <WH7227> in lovingkindness <WH2617> unto all them that call upon thee <WH7121>.
Give ear <WH238>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, unto my prayer <WH8605>; And hearken <WH7181> unto the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.
In the day <WH3117> of my trouble <WH6869> I will call <WH7121> upon thee <WH6030>; For thou wilt answer me.
There is none like unto thee among the gods <WH430>, O Lord <WH136>; Neither are there any works like unto thy works <WH4639>.
All nations <WH1471> whom thou hast made <WH6213> shall come <WH935> and worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> thee <WH136>, O Lord; And they shall glorify <WH3513> thy name <WH8034>.
For thou art great <WH1419>, and doest <WH6213> wondrous things <WH6381>: Thou art God alone <WH430>.
Teach <WH3384> me thy way <WH1870>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; I will walk <WH1980> in thy truth <WH571>: Unite <WH3161> my heart <WH3824> to fear <WH3372> thy name <WH8034>.
I will praise <WH3034> thee <WH136>, O Lord my God <WH430>, with my whole heart <WH3824>; And I will glorify <WH3513> thy name <WH8034> for evermore <WH5769>.
For great <WH1419> is thy lovingkindness <WH2617> toward me <WH5337>; And thou hast delivered my soul <WH5315> from the lowest <WH8482> Sheol <WH7585>.

O God <WH430>, the proud <WH2086> are risen <WH6965> up against me <WH5712>, And a company of violent <WH6184> men have sought <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315>, And have not set thee before them <WH7760>.
But thou <WH136>, O Lord, art a God <WH410> merciful <WH7349> and gracious <WH2587>, Slow <WH750> to anger <WH7227>, and abundant in lovingkindness <WH2617> and truth <WH571>.
Oh turn <WH6437> unto me <WH2603>, and have mercy upon me <WH5414>; Give thy strength <WH5797> unto thy servant <WH5650>, And save <WH3467> the son <WH1121> of thy handmaid <WH519>.

Show <WH6213> me a token <WH226> for good <WH2896>, That they who hate <WH8130> me may see <WH7200> it <WH954>, and be put to shame, Because thou <WH3068>, Jehovah, hast helped <WH5826> me <WH5162>, and comforted me.
